summary.value: I know magic, and real magic requires effort and sacrifice.

system.description:
ALSO: Cultist, Support Mage

  • Have you taken part in a ritual that changed things for the worse? How?

  • How do you feel about not being in the spotlight? Do you feel appreciated?

  • Were you a part of a cult or similar group? Were they a force for good, or evil?

  • How do you help with other people’s magic? Is it knowledge, or your nature?

RITUALIST FREE BENEFITS
  • Permanently increase your maximum Mind Points by 5.
  • Allows you to perform rituals of the Ritualism category.

PREDATOR SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.b3957bVbdzYwhFfP]{Accelerate Ritual (SL3)}

Whenever you mark a segment of a ritual’s Clock, you may spend 【SL × 20】 MP to mark an additional segment for every 20 MP spent this way.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.P3mO0mVJdfAhpntw]{Arcane Lore (SL5)}

Whenever you make an Open Check related to your knowledge of magic, curses, rituals, spells, or other similar effects, add a bonus equal to 【SL】 on that Check.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.i4PPAb0jouUfyiYv]{Magical Countermeasures (SL2)}

When you perform the Guard skill, increase your M.DEF by 【SL】 until the start of your next turn.

If you choose to provide cover for another creature, they also benefit from this.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.4yBals9akG0i4TuI]{Ritualistic Efficiency (SL2)}

Gain a 【SL】 bonus to any Ritual check you perform. Reduce the base cost of Rituals you initiate by 【SL × 5】 MP (down to a minimum of 1).

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.bhk8nPeipfXj23ME]{Spellcasting Assistant} (SL3)

Whenever you support an ally’s Magic Check through Teamwork, choose 【SL】 options:

  • Grant an additional +1 bonus to their Magic Check.

  • If the spell deals damage or restores HP, increase that number by 5.

  • Reduce the spell's total MP cost by 5, down to a minimum of 0.

You can pick the same option more than once.

HEROIC SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-heroic-skills.Item.3FB1cuMjdE0t8kE3]{Mana Link}

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-heroic-skills.Item.Sw7sq2HALV6jgpnF]{Shared Spellbooks}
